info.name: Outlook Blackout Customize it your way!
info.description: Red & Black style for Outlook.com/Hotmail Login/Mail/Skype, the colors are customizable, looks great with FT DeepDark Firefox skin by steva https://addons.mozilla.org/en-GB/firefox/addon/ft-deepdark/?src=cb-dl-users.
info.additionalInfo:
Works on Mozilla Firefox, Google Chrome, Vivaldi and possible others.

You can set the color scheme however you like, make it colorful, make it bright or make it dark.

Please rate, share and consider a small donation if you loved this style :)

data.title: Doesn't work for me for some reason
